nodes.bodyText:
reword as:

The following workflow should be followed to create and publish a new Envoy Mobile release <https://github.com/lyft/envoy-mobile/releases>_.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,40 @@
+.. _releasing_instructions:
+
+Releasing
+=========
+
+Prepare for release
+-------------------
+
+When a new `release <https://github.com/lyft/envoy-mobile/releases>`_ is ready to be tagged,
+the following workflow should be followed to create and publish a new Envoy Mobile release.

nodes.bodyText: sorry, this is silly, but could you put this sentence between Releasing and prepare for release? It applies to both subsections.
